title: Riot please fix this.
body:
http://i.gyazo.com/1b474d90a4177bb1f105a60982bce826.png

I said one thing, godforbid if i try to call lanes...

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Your Neighbour,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=chmEOyER,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-06-05T06:39:15.764+0000)
>
> Play other lanes lol

The whole point is to call a lane you want, when my chat is blocked for 5 seconds after I join it leaves little hope of getting a lane I want, seeing as all I play is ADC I'm limited in what I can play.
Never had that issue before did you get chat blocked?
I don't see the problem? I don't want to listen to my team's banal bullshit

yeah, it was so good when they got rid of the chat restriction and let us type as normal, because lets be real here, write one thing and then get chat restricted isn't fun and will probably make you go a role you don't want.

This shit keeps happening to me **SOMETIMES BEFORE I EVEN TYPE ANYTHING** so annoying I think it has to do with spam clicking the box or spamming the enter button and nothing to do with the amount of messages actually sent

> [{quoted}](name=Niji,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=chmEOyER,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-06-04T14:08:49.405+0000)
>
> This shit keeps happening to me **SOMETIMES BEFORE I EVEN TYPE ANYTHING** so annoying I think it has to do with spam clicking the box or spamming the enter button and nothing to do with the amount of messages actually sent

Idk, really. I was in a premade group and we were in que for a game when I got chat restricted up to 3 times in that 2 minute wait.

Prolly because I type really fast but I doubt it

i called 2 times, blocked
i try calling, i dont get it due to my chat dcing
i cant talk to anybody, and people think im raging, due to chat dc
there is more shit riot need to fix
